text: Doesn't work any more here either.
Doesn't work anymore. The enshitification of the internet rumbles on
not working on Microsoft Edge Version 115.0.1901.188 (Official build) (64-bit)
Please fix that, it doesn't work at all.

Really cool. Does what it says it does. The writing on Medium, in some cases, is good enough that it's worth fighting for and/or paying for - whatever the case may be. In addition to this extension I use another extension called Readup which removes all the social icons and bloat on Medium and has a nice community in the comments. Long live the indie web!
not working at all !! but i have to install it again, for comment.
Does not work (anymore) (annoying popup still popping up).
It worked when I installed earlier. But now I don't think it works. Medium is asking me to upgrade
Very useful, but that giant top bar is sticky again and the extension is not hiding it anymore :(

Wow. Medium.com has the most obnoxious popups I've seen on the internet. If I were a webmaster there I would be afraid to show myself in public.
The fact that this plugin exists AND that it is widely regarded as a life saver says it all. Too bad people keep putting content on medium.com and that medium.com keeps pretending everything is fine.
Thank you for this plugin.
Was working well, now the top bar at hackernoon is showing. :(
how to use it man, I am not able to operate it, do I have to log in, I don't think so.
Reading a Medium website is like getting waterboarded by banners. This extension removes both the water and the cloth, allowing you to breathe again.
Oh. My. God. I never write reviews for extensions but this changed my life. I hate all of the things that Medium does that this extension fixes. THANK YOU!
It is awesome. Moreover, it is open source.

_ahhh_

so very spacious

so void of nagging

so free!

that's so raven!

Thank you SO MUCH for this extension. Medium got on my nerves lately, now I'm happily reading again. 
Great work!
Amazing! I just hope that this extension is not that heavy for Chrome load times. Good work! Keep up.
Thank you to the developer of this extension.  Works PERFECTLY.
Thank you for this. It's especially useful when trying to follow a tutorial.
Thank goodness this exists. Medium.com chasing various forms of "engagement" which block actual reading are making for a very poor experience.

Thanks for this. Found it while I was considering writing my own. Makes Medium less annoying to use for sure.

Having checkboxes you can't uncheck in the settings confused me for a minute, but I guess that's a list of features, not a list of options.
thank you, thank you, thank you!
It didn't work at first, but tapped the MMRA icon and reloaded the medium page I was viewing, and voila. I didn't realize how obnoxious Medium was getting until today. Thanks!
